content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity generator at position(-10.5, 25.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Offshore pump at position(-10.5, 25.5)
- Boiler at position(-4.5, 24.0) 
- Steam engine at position(-0.5, -9.5)

### Copper plate mine at position(0, 0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill at position(0, 0) and a furnace at position(0, 0)

### Lab at position(-4.5, 25.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Lab at position(-4.5, 25.5)

### Copper cable factory
Consists of the following entities:
- Assembling machine at position(z1) and inserter at position(a) that puts into assembling machine
- Beltgroup that connects the furnace at position(y1) to assembling machine at position(z1)

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when connecting pipes
- Ensure that there are no obstructions in the path when attempting to connect pipes. Check for any entities that may block the connection.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting placing.

### Errors with power connections
- Verify that all power connections are properly established and that entities requiring power are connected to a power source.
